param.name: virtualMachineAddOrUpdateProperties
param.description: Updates to any of the vRA custom properties

attrib.name: logPayload
attrib.description: Determines if the contents of the payload input will be logged

attrib.name: vcVm
attrib.description: vCenter VM (null for BuildingMachine)

attrib.name: vcacEntity
attrib.description: vCAC Entity object of the target VM

attrib.name: vcacHost
attrib.description: IaaS Host of the target VM

attrib.name: customProperties
attrib.description: vRA Custom Properties of the target VM

attrib.name: vcacVm
attrib.description: vCAC VM object ofthe target VM

attrib.name: vmName
attrib.description: The name of the target VM in vRA and vCenter

attrib.name: custSpec
attrib.description: The selected Customization Spec

attrib.name: domainName
attrib.description: Active Directory domain name

attrib.name: adOU
attrib.description: Selected OU

attrib.name: createdAdObject
attrib.description: The computer object created within Active Directory.

attrib.name: primaryDns
attrib.description: The primary DNS address

attrib.name: secondaryDns
attrib.description: The secondary DNS address

attrib.name: ipamConnection
attrib.description: Connection to the IPAM server.

attrib.name: hostName
attrib.description: Host name (FQDN).

attrib.name: dnsView
attrib.description: DNS view, in which the host exists/will be created.

attrib.name: ipAddress
attrib.description: IPv4/IPv6 address assigned to the host.

attrib.name: enableDhcp
attrib.description: Enable DHCP flag for the created host entry.

attrib.name: enableDns
attrib.description: Enable DNS flag for the created host entry.

attrib.name: aliases
attrib.description: List of aliases for the host entry in FQDN format. Used only on creation of the host.

workflow-item.name: item2

bind.name: virtualMachineAddOrUpdateProperties
bind.description: Custom or system properties that were modified by the vRO workflow and returned to vRA

workflow-item.name: item1

bind.name: payload
bind.description: Input object from the vRA Event Subscription

bind.name: logPayload
bind.description: Determines if the contents of the payload input will be logged

bind.name: vcVm
bind.description: vCenter VM (null for BuildingMachine)

bind.name: vcacEntity
bind.description: vCAC Entity object of the target VM

bind.name: vcacHost
bind.description: IaaS Host of the target VM

bind.name: customProperties
bind.description: vRA Custom Properties of the target VM

bind.name: vcacVm
bind.description: vCAC VM object ofthe target VM

bind.name: vmName
bind.description: The name of the target VM in vRA and vCenter

workflow-item.description: Uses the vRA 7 'payload' input to get most the vRA 6 workflow input objects, such as the Custom Properties, vCenter VM, vCAC VM, etc.

workflow-item.name: item3
workflow-item.description: Log the input text to the console log with level 'log'

workflow-item.name: item4
workflow-item.description: Log the input text to the console log with level 'log'

workflow-item.name: item5
item6
workflow-item.display-name: Create a computer in an organizational unit

bind.name: ou
bind.description: Parent organizational unit for the new computer

bind.name: computerName
bind.description: Name for the new computer

bind.name: domainName
bind.description: Domain name in form: company.sample (optional)

workflow-item.description: Creates an Active Directory computer in an organizational unit.

workflow-item.name: item7
item8

bind.name: ipamConnection
bind.description: Connection to the IPAM server.

bind.name: hostName
bind.description: Host name (FQDN).

bind.name: dnsView
bind.description: DNS view, in which the host exists/will be created.

bind.name: ipAddress
bind.description: IPv4/IPv6 address assigned to the host.

bind.name: macAddress
bind.description: MAC address or DUID of the host. Required if enableDhcp is true.

bind.name: enableDhcp
bind.description: Enable DHCP flag for the created host entry.

bind.name: enableDns
bind.description: Enable DNS flag for the created host entry.

bind.name: aliases
bind.description: List of aliases for the host entry in FQDN format. Used only on creation of the host.

bind.name: comment
bind.description: Comments about the host. Used only on creation of the host.

bind.name: ea1Definition
bind.description: Definition of the Extensible Attribute #1. Used only on creation of the host.

bind.name: ea1Value
bind.description: Value of the Extensible Attribute #1. Used only on creation of the host.

bind.name: ea2Definition
bind.description: Definition of the Extensible Attribute #2. Used only on creation of the host.

bind.name: ea2Value
bind.description: Value of the Extensible Attribute #2. Used only on creation of the host.

bind.name: ea3Definition
bind.description: Definition of the Extensible Attribute #3. Used only on creation of the host.

bind.name: ea3Value
bind.description: Value of the Extensible Attribute #3. Used only on creation of the host.

bind.name: ea4Definition
bind.description: Definition of the Extensible Attribute #4. Used only on creation of the host.

bind.name: ea4Value
bind.description: Value of the Extensible Attribute #4. Used only on creation of the host.

bind.name: ea5Definition
bind.description: Definition of the Extensible Attribute #5. Used only on creation of the host.

bind.name: ea5Value
bind.description: Value of the Extensible Attribute #5. Used only on creation of the host.

bind.name: ea6Definition
bind.description: Definition of the Extensible Attribute #6. Used only on creation of the host.

bind.name: ea6Value
bind.description: Value of the Extensible Attribute #6. Used only on creation of the host.

bind.name: ea7Definition
bind.description: Definition of the Extensible Attribute #7. Used only on creation of the host.

bind.name: ea7Value
bind.description: Value of the Extensible Attribute #7. Used only on creation of the host.

bind.name: ea8Definition
bind.description: Definition of the Extensible Attribute #8. Used only on creation of the host.

bind.name: ea8Value
bind.description: Value of the Extensible Attribute #8. Used only on creation of the host.

bind.name: ea9Definition
bind.description: Definition of the Extensible Attribute #9. Used only on creation of the host.

bind.name: ea9Value
bind.description: Value of the Extensible Attribute #9. Used only on creation of the host.

bind.name: ea10Definition
bind.description: Definition of the Extensible Attribute #10. Used only on creation of the host.

bind.name: ea10Value
bind.description: Value of the Extensible Attribute #10. Used only on creation of the host.

bind.name: restartIfNeeded
bind.description: Perform restart of DHCP service if needed

workflow-item.description: Adds a host record to IPAM with the specified static IP address.
